summary: A wandering tough biker girl aids a female delinquent gang in their battles against an all-male Seiyu group over a fixed boxing match.
cast: Akiko Wada|Meiko Kaji|Kôji Wada|Tatsuya Fuji|Bunjaku Han|Yuka Kumari|Mari Koiso|Toshimitsu Shima|Hideshi Yoshikawa|Hanako Tokachi|Miki Yanagi|George Tomita|Yûko Shimazu|Yuka Ôhashi|Hiroshi Ichimura|Yasuhiro Kameyama|Hajime Sugiyama|Kiyoshi Kamoda|Jirô Hiratsuka|Masaaki Honme|Kuniya Mizukawa|Kazuo Takamoto|Yoshihiko Tabata|Masashi Tomizawa|Tomio Aoki|Kazuo Kinugasa|Mitsuru Sawa|Yuki Seto|Tadayuki Kitagami|Yoshirô Suzuki|Masahiro Yafuji|Katsumi Kojima|Yoshitaka Shimakura|Nobuko Endô|Hiroko Satô|Masami Maki|Junko Araki|Susumu Fujita|Yoshio Saitô|Gorô Mutsumi|Tadao Nakamaru|Yôsui Inoue|Ken Sanders
title: Nora-neko rokku: Onna banchô
